column5: I was wondering if anyone has used  Studio Tax to prepare that personal income tax? Its free.
Nope, I used Quick Tax through Scotiabank online. Cost me 15 bucks.
I used to do mine by myself all the time.  It's easy.  Now that we have the business though I go to a CA.
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=c1jqLximBZI   please take the 10 mins and watch this...very informative...I do believe Canada is the same.
Based on your question I downloaded and gave StudioTax a shot. Provided the same results as UFile.  Looks like a decent product at the right price.

Got my T4, still waiting on the last of RRSP contribution to come in...did a prelim and I gonna get some money back... yyyyaaayyyy!  In one hand and out the other as I will be paying my property tax with it....c'est la vie.
I used ufile and already got my refund can't argue with that....
just used it today for the first time and i like it. ive used ufile a couple times but i think ill stick to studio now. looks like i get to go shopping
